content.question: Tubmanâ€™s testimony was part of a larger effort by abolitionists to highlight which of the following?

choices.label: The challenges of life for Black women during segregation
The effects of Black Codes on the lives of newly freed African Americans
The experiences of enslaved people in order to advance the cause of freedom
The claims that African Americans would be unable to integrate into society

content.answer: The experiences of enslaved people in order to advance the cause of freedom

topic.text: 2.5: Slave Auctions and the Domestic Slave Trade

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
